original_text: Then the Lord's Spirit took hold of me. He said to me, ‘This is the Lord's message to the people: Tell them, “People of Israel, I know what you are saying. I know the thoughts that you have in your minds.
korean_text: 여호와의 영이 내게 임하여 이르시되 너는 말하기를 여호와의 말씀에 이스라엘 족속아 너희가 이렇게 말하였도다 너희 마음에서 일어나는 것을 내가 다 아노라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord's Spirit took hold of me
This is the Lord's message to the people
I know what you are saying
I know the thoughts that you have in your minds
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희 마음속에 있는 생각들을 안다
